website_summaries.verdict: A gel-filled recoil pad that offers a simple solution for protecting your arms and shoulders while shooting, without hindering the shouldering of your weapon.
pros: Thick padding feels comfortable on the shoulder while shooting
Universal-size fits most rifles and shotguns
Easy to move around to different guns quickly
cons: Fit can be tight around older rifle and shotgun stocks
Padding is prone to wear after seasons of use

customer_reviews.title: Works, but questionable lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these, one for me and one for my father. Mine is still doing well, but Dad's started to fray after about 3 rounds of sporting clays (300 shots, 3 days of shooting). For the price, I was hoping for something a bit more durable. They definitely work, though! Quite a significant reduction in recoil. Has made our shooting days much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!! After shooting my AR10 .308 for the first time without it, I would start to hesitate the recoil because it was just so abusive. But after using this recoil pad it eliminated all of my hesitation, and I can actually start to enjoy shooting my rifle! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, used it yesterday at the range. Fit our long guns and the shot guns. Good fit. Quality product. Thick Gel Provides a good cushion. Really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Where has this product been?
customer_reviews.text: TinyPrice was right on the money. No delay getting here and the cost was fair. Tried it out on a 12ga (7/8's) and 30-30 (160gr) this last weekend. I was amazed at this product. Please don't get me wrong, your shoulder is still aware you are firing a gun. However, the level of pain or shock is drastically reduced. A round of skeet with the old 870 was enjoyable again. Plinking with the the lever action was good times revisited for these old bones. I will most likely get another one from TinyPrice. Why not? This item has made the indispensable list for my shooting bag.
customer_reviews.author: KroMag

customer_reviews.title: Great Recoil Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great recoil pad. I bought for my Sharps Pedersoli 45-70 and it's exactly what I needed. If you need a slip on recoil pad this is the one you need.
customer_reviews.author: James Flagg

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stock in place better for me than without it, and reduces recoil a bit.
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty small little old lady, 5'4" and 128 lbs. My 20 gauge shotgun gives me a lot of recoil, so I "installed" this. Easy to slip on. And it DOES keep the stock in place on me better than without it, and reduces recoil a bit.
customer_reviews.author: FromThereToHere

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It fit like a glove and noticeably reduced the recoil. I put it on a Franchi 48-AL 12 gauge which is a very light shotgun. Because it is so light it has a pretty good little kick. At first it's not so bad but after you shoot it for a while it starts to wear on you. I've had a limbsaver grind to fit pad on it for years and the rubber on the pad started to deteriorate and become very sticky. I just haven't taken the time to replace it so I bought this to put over it and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: 50 boxes-3 days-NO pain
customer_reviews.text: I read about another’s dove hunting trip in Argentina. This is the exact trip I just made. 50 boxes of shells over three days. Wonderful product. Absolutely no shoulder pain at all. I had a vest with a gel pad in the shoulder. This didn’t work near as well as the Recoil Eraser. I removed the pad from the vest and used the Recoil Eraser by it self. I think the difference is that the gel pad is part of your clothing while the Recoil Eraser becomes part of the gun. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thomas Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Get One! Your shoulder will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.text: I put this slip on recoil pad on my new 1895 Marlin 45/70 Govt. lever action rifle zeroed it in @25 yards just like the ballistics chart shows, shot 4 shots in about 20 minutes and the recoil didn't feel any worse than shooting my Remington .270 and my shoulder didn't feel the least bit sore afterwards. This particular rifle and Huge Round has some "Buck" to it, and it's not for small framed people, but I think I could shoot all day with this recoil pad. So I'm giving this recoil pad 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MoHunter

customer_reviews.title: So I put it on my new s&r model 60 ...
customer_reviews.text: So I put it on my new s&r model 60 (12 guage semi-auto. It had a fairly gentle recoil but I wanted to see if I could totally kill it. My dad who hadn't fired a gun in 2 decades picked this up and pulled the trigger. He turned to me and said "you didn't load it". It was very much so loaded. This pad turned my gentle recoil into nothing. We were at a gun range so he assumed the sound was just from someone next to us. Outstanding. I'd buy more to put on other rifles/shotguns.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why others seem to have problems with this product. I have a Weatherby 30.06 and I was able to put this product on my rifle with no problems. The only problem I had with it is that all the gel inserts were sewn in. I would have much preferred adding them as I needed. It does make the range of your arm motion and scope viewing a bit different so I have been practicing putting it up to the proper position so that when I take it to the range to test it out I'll be ready for the difference. I'm looking forward to testing it out at the range.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ramer

customer_reviews.title: Just shot 5 consecutive rounds and would have done a 6th if there was time.
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from the trap field and ordered another one for my backup gun. I'd typically tap out after 3 or 4 rounds because my shoulder is screaming by the 3rd round. Just shot 5 consecutive rounds and would have done a 6th if there was time. Can't speak to the durability, because I've only had mine for a short period of time, but five stars for now in terms of reducing recoil.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: This works great really takes the thump out of this custom choked ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great really takes the thump out of this custom choked 12 guage single shot turkey gun I have that knocks fire from me. 1st time I shot it felt like it broke my shoulder put this on and not worried a bit about shooting it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chisenhall

customer_reviews.title: Some recoil reduction, but not a lot -- thin pad.
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement says that it is a "thick pad". I was expecting a pad with the usual 1 inch thickness. The pad I received is between .6 and .7 of an inch in thickness. I put it on a CVA Hunter in 45-70 caliber and it reduced the recoil slightly. Another .3 to .4 of an inch of recoil reduction materiel would probably done what I was expecting. Almost sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical before buying but the glowing reviews and my continuous bruised shoulder drew me in. I used it for the first time for my 12 gauge and it works pretty darn good. I was very pleased with it and was able to go from Trap shooting to a Ballroom dance without a bruised and black n blue shoulder! Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Worcester MA

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This pad works just as expected, no problems other than it is a little small so I had to stretch it over my M1 Garand which caused the part that slips over the stock to tear a little bit but it where the stitching is so there’s really no problem also the pad does walk side to side it does not stay straight but it’s not that noticeable. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I shoot a 300 Weatherby Mag. with 180 grain ...
customer_reviews.text: I shoot a 300 Weatherby Mag. with 180 grain bullet. The recoil pad really took the sting out of it. Don't keep taking a beating, buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Should be better than this
customer_reviews.text: It is too tight and small for a normal shootgun stock, i believe it will cut off after couple of rounds at the range. It is lower quality than my expectations for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: mohammad hashem

customer_reviews.title: A must for recoil management or overall comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very worthy investment for my first personal shotgun. I tend to shoot about 50-60 shells during a quick range session. Though the recoil on a 20g isn’t too bad (I shoot 2 3/4 Slugs since our range is indoors.) it can leave my shoulder sore. It’s a much more comfortable alternative as opposed to the hard rubber end on the stock prior. My husband took all the photos. And he enjoys shooting my 20g Stevens 320 more than his fancy 12g Benneli.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any shotgun
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says. Takes the punch out of firing a shotgun. Feels. Great the way it sits on my shoulder. I got carried away at the range and was fast firing rounds because this buffer pad took the hits for me. Went through 25 rounds in a few minutes. My wallet hates it haha, but I've never had more fun firing a shotgun. Zombies beware. No bruises on my shoulders. A must have for your shotgun.
customer_reviews.author: Justinmh1634

customer_reviews.title: 270 very nicely. I just had shoulder surgery and was concerned ...
customer_reviews.text: These are worth every penny. They take the bite out of my .270 very nicely. I just had shoulder surgery and was concerned about the recoil. I am no longer concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: I like it enough to have ordered several
customer_reviews.text: I like this recoil pad, and I’ve bought several, including one as a gift. It adds as much cushion as any recoil pad I’ve tried, so I put these on shotguns to soften the shoulder punch for family members (and myself). I wish it were a bit less expensive, but it’s still worth it. This recoil pad is a bit like adding a small pillow behind the buttstock, so it changes the overall look for the rifle or shotgun. I favor comfort over beauty, here, so I’m very happy with it. It isn’t subtle, though.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Frinier

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for 700BDL in 30-06
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using this on a Remington 700 BDL, 30-06. It was VERY tight trying to slip on and the nylon fabric began tearing. It needs to be redesigned or reevaluated by the maker.
customer_reviews.author: Danriverboy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended if you do a lot of shooting. I'm sold on this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have it installed on a Remington 1187 12 gauge, easy to install and holds tight and in -place after many shots fired. I like how it can be easily switched to another gun if needed. I tested it for first time last weekend at a European shoot. I shot over a 140 shells and my shoulder usually would be sore, but it reduced the recoil a lot. The next day my shoulder felt good without any soreness. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dale I. T

customer_reviews.title: Even bought one for my husband so it doesn't look like I beat him
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my elderly father in law, we figure anything would help so he didn't get knocked over. Works very well no dislocated shoulder. Even bought one for my husband so it doesn't look like I beat him.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and stitching ripped in two areas as I was placing on shotgun
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a shotgun after reading other reviews. The fit is snug and took some time to work it on. My shoulder really appreciates the gel pad. Nice cushion when out target shooting. I'm so pleased with this one that I plan to order another. Edited to add that I did purchase a a second. I highly recommend this product and this business!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: It slipped on easily but snugly
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived on time. At first glance, the pad appeared to small but I took out my Winchester Model 1892 and slipped it on. It slipped on easily but snugly. I took the rifle to the range last night and the Recoil Eraser worked like a champ. I reload my ammo (.44 Rem Mag) to near maximum charge so this Recoil Pad eliminated the soreness my son feels the day following the use of the rifle. The pad removes easily so this replica rifle still has it's authentic appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: I have the pad installed but have yet to see ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the pad installed but have yet to see how well it cushions recoil. 3 stars now and maybe more depending on performance. UPDATE: I have the recoil eraser on a AR platform in .308 Win. After 50+ rounds my shoulder does not hurt as it did without the eraser. This product does an excellent job of taming recoil, so much so I ordered a 2nd one for my .270 bolt action. Happy 😄 customer!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel on a Hawg

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Old Henry Golden Boy Lever Action chambered in .357 Magnum. I love that rifle, but holy cow, after about 10 rounds at the range, you're ready to call it quits due to the kick. This recoil pad was easy to put on the butt stock and feels good. This little dandy made a huge difference in the kick my shoulder was enduring at the range!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D Oliver

customer_reviews.title: The product name says it all!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my pre-64 Winchester model 70 rifle chambered in 300 Win Mag. This rifle would badly bruise my shoulder with just 20 rounds. I installed the recoil Eraser and shot 70 rounds down range with minimal pain to my shoulder and no bruises. I would recommend this product to anyone with a high power rifle.
customer_reviews.author: tonyfs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Stevens 320 Security Shotgun, Pump Action, 12 Gauge. Its made shooting enjoyable. Many reviewers complained that they had trouble pulling it over their butts. 😏 some butts are bigger than others. Jokes aside all you have to do is turn it inside out and roll it on. Very easy and no tears or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.  Reduces felt recoil.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this recoil pad because its gel-filled, and the ratings. I had a total shoulder replacement 1 year ago (2019). The first time I shot a high-power rifle (30-06) it became painful after 20-rounds and presented a high risk to my shoulder. My doctor advised I use a gel-filled recoil pad. The pad fits well on my Remington M1917, and Mosin-Nagant M44. I have only put 10-rounds through the Mosin M44 as a test but the reduction in felt recoil is very noticeable. So far, I am very happy. I will write a follow-up after I get a chance to further test the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The material used to construct this sleeve is thin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pad for my 500 series Mossberg Tactical 12 guage. I know that it should be snug. However, I had to fight to get it on. Unfortunately i put a small hole in the material sleeve while struggling to slide it on. I would think that this material would be a little thicker. If it were thicker, I would've still struggled to get it on but it wouldn't have a hole in the mesh which has now been compromised. I will now have to find a sleeve that is made of a stronger material. Perhaps I didn't use the proper technique but it isn't rocket science.
customer_reviews.author: ed bloss

customer_reviews.title: The recoil pad took a little bit of work to get on but once it was on it was good and secured
customer_reviews.text: Works just a described. I bought this for an old hunting rifle my grandpa gave me. It was a 30-06 and when I saw the aluminum butt plate on a solid wood stock I knew I needed a little more cushion. The recoil pad took a little bit of work to get on but once it was on it was good and secured. The pad did a good job, after 20 rounds of 30-06 my shoulder didn't fell even a little sore. I would and already have recommended this to my friends for their hunting rifles.
customer_reviews.author: Douglass C.

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT FIT
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT IS TOO SMALL FOR EVEN A RIMFIRE RIFLE I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT WOULD FIT BUT IT IS TOO SMALL FOR ANY RIFLE OR SHOTGUN I HAVE EVER ENCOUNTERED
customer_reviews.author: Mohave green Enterprises Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much for a quality product I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My recoil eraser came in the mail really fast. I installed it on my shotgun and it took a ton of recoil out. I have a new shoulder and The Recoil eraser did its job. Thank you so much for a quality product I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will never own a lage caliber rifle without one on it
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Shot 100 rounds through my M1A of .308 150 grain rounds, and felt like I could keep firing all day. The price is great, and while snug, and taking some effort, it fit perfectly on my rifle. I ordered another for my fathers .308 on the way back from the range. I will never own a large caliber rifle without putting one on it. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: First blush: Well made product that fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and product arrived just as described. Fit my Mossberg 500 perfectly. Appears to be well made and thick enough to help with recoil. Haven’t used the shotgun since receiving it so can’t really judge effectiness or durability quite yet. Update: Fired 25 rifled slugs through the shotgun at range. What a difference in recoil! Ok I’m sold.... this is a great addition to any heavy hitting gun!
customer_reviews.author: BD bobier

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Tight to get on so they stay put...I am an older female shooter and put one on my 270 Weatherby mag no muzzle break. Does add protection with bulk so great during practice or out hunting. I put one on my 22 year old daughter's 300 win mag. That gun does have a muzzle break but putting this on the rifle made it even more comfortable for her to shoot...No issues with the gel hunting in 9' weather.. great product
customer_reviews.author: Mule719

customer_reviews.title: Will no buy it or recommended !
customer_reviews.text: I'm only 5' 7" , 148 # and while pulling the Recoil Eraser in my Weatherby it ripped on the right and the Left ! Can believe it !!! Now what ???
customer_reviews.author: Stealthunter 338

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product helped my 12 yr old son immensley. He was going hunting for the first time and wanted to use a higher caliber gun to increase likelihood of a kill rather than risk only wounding a deer with his small 9mm rifle. He tried shooting a Remington mod783 cal 270Win but the kick hurt his shoulder. After putting this recoil pad on the rifle, he was able to get through range practice with no problem and confidently take the rifle hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Scriven de Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 1903A3 Springfield. The recoil with the plain steel butt plate shooting from a bench was rather uncomfortable. I wanted something that was not permanent but would make it more comfortable to shoot. I could shoot with this all day. It is very tight fitting, but doesn't move around at all.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the last time I went trap shooting I had a bruise that lasted almost 2 weeks. I used it for the first time today and I was concerned that the extra length it added to the trigger pull would affect my score. It did affect my score, but instead of going down it actually went up. I am also happy to report no bruises today!
customer_reviews.author: K9Doc

customer_reviews.title: He pretends like he is tough and doesn't need it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend. He pretends like he is tough and doesn't need it, but I think it does. It fit really well on a 12 gauge shotgun.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Laird

customer_reviews.title: Good but with limitations
customer_reviews.text: This pad does greatly reduce the recoil but to use with a scope will push you back from the eyepiece. This limits your field of view, especially at the scopes higher power range. My scope is already seated at the back of the mount so I have to dial down the power to use it in an acceptable manner.
customer_reviews.author: W. D. Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maintain sight picture after firing
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for about 100 rounds through a mossberg 500, ultimately didn't enjoy it enough to keep it, ordered a limbsaver as a direct replacement to the stock rather than a slip on. It works well for recoil, but upon firing it doesn't sit in shoulder very well for follow up shots and sight picture. I've worn different materials on my shoulder to try and help it stick a little better, even with an overly tight shouldering it just didn't want to stay set in a firing position after shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Simons

customer_reviews.title: Fits a .30 cal M1 Carbine like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I have an Auto Ordnance .30 Cal. M1 Carbine and the recoil eraser fits it like a glove. Have not fired the weapon with the recoil eraser on so I can't report on that yet, but since I am an Army vet and Monday is Memorial Day I'm going to the range then so I'll add more comments after that excursion.
customer_reviews.author: oibv305

customer_reviews.title: Great Pad
customer_reviews.text: I am teaching my Daughter to shoot, her 7mm-08 so I don't her beat up. Bought this in the hope that it would help while not being too bulky. It work s great
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Jim

customer_reviews.title: Definitely reduces recoil
customer_reviews.text: Put on Mossberg 500 12 gauge. Makes it feel like a soft 20 gauge. Little pad at butt end was a bit of a pain to keep lined up, but overall after a 100 rounds, seems much easier on the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis_H

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Needed some extra to protect my shoulder from turning blue from my berretta silver hawk double barrel. This puppy worked perfectly!!! It is a delight now to shoot trap. Highly reccomend it. Just orders my second one to give to my son for his Remington pump shotgun.makes a great present . Hope you enjoy it as much I do.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Remington 870 Express
customer_reviews.text: It's a snug fit on my Remington 870 Express. It takes some to maneuver the pad around the rubber butt plate, short fat fingers don't help. Once lined up it fits like a glove. Bringing it up to the shoulder feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Slips on and off easily but stays in place well. I’m shooting a range of military bolt action rifles and they have quite a kick - the pad really cuts the impact on my shoulder without affecting control. Delivery was fast and without problems. Excallent value
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick on my .308.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Remington 783 .308 riffle. The recoil on it for me was a lot. Especially for just taking it to the range. Anyway when I got it, it was small. It was extremely tight but when I used it, the recoil was much more manageable. Love the product. Let’s just hope it lasts. 🤞
customer_reviews.author: SAO

customer_reviews.title: Slip On Recoil Pad, Gel Filled
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Very tight installation was a little difficult as the pad was a little small. Comfort was excellent. Not bad for the price. Just wish the pad was a little larger to fit the butt of the stock.
customer_reviews.author: SifuBob

customer_reviews.title: Nice pad for general recoil reduction
customer_reviews.text: Shipped/Arrived Quick. Seems well made and will save my shoulder since my old recoil pad is bad. Has a lot of of recoil reduction; may be too thick for some people. Will, of course, add slightly to length of pull. If you shoot shot sports and start with your shotgun mounted to your shoulder you should be fine. If you start unmounted and need to slide the stock up to your shoulder it may take some practice.
customer_reviews.author: Terriell D. Scrimager II

customer_reviews.title: Does a very nice job
customer_reviews.text: Can be a bit difficult to install because of a tight fit. But, it is not as difficult as some others I have tried. It did seem to make a considerable difference in felt recoil when installed on my old 30/06, much more so than I had even anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A

customer_reviews.title: You can pay much more for but names but why?
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Sorbothane recoil pad that stayed sticky it's while life. It worked but was a pain to clean after hunts in the desert. This pad is great. Seems much better at reducing recoil. It slips on and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: P. Copher

customer_reviews.title: very effective
customer_reviews.text: A pain in the but to install on some firearms but very effective at stopping recoil. Used to only be able to shoot my shotgun a dozen times before I started to feel it. With this i shot 6 dozen rounds no pain at all.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Nash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! It almost totally eliminated the recoil from my Mossberg 590 shotgun. Little tough to get on but that ensures for a snug fit. I’m totally impressed and really endorse this product. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: chaz.photo

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, really reduces the recoil
customer_reviews.text: I put this pad on my Marlin 308, and wow what a difference! It took some pulling and working to get the sleeve on and to get the pad positioned properly, but it ended up being a good fit. The recoil reduction is really quite amazing.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Lind

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits a large variety of rifles. Fits some better than others, only 1 so far has not fit it. On the times I have tried it, I will say it makes a good difference. Takes the painful metal butplate and makes it something more pleasant to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Made shooting much more fun with this gun!
customer_reviews.text: I've had an Ithaca 37 Featherlight for a long time now and while I love it's light weight, the recoil is downright killer. With this pad, I've been able to do the shooting that I want and not feel like I broke my shoulder the next morning. The pad itself is very easy to install (literally just put it on like a glove) and does not get in the way of my aiming. I've had zero issues with this product and I can't believe I didn't get it sooner. If you're like me and you can't stand the recoil on your shotgun, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes high-powered rifle shooting feel like cheating
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I shoot a Remington .308, and it feels like a .243. Not even exaggerating. Fired 30 rounds from a bench, and didn't have a single mark on me, shooting high-test hunting reloads (150-168 gr butt-whippers). You need this. You, yes you.
customer_reviews.author: Cthon

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: This is very hard to get on, the seam ripped during installation, and on both my rifle and shotgun it interferes with the sling mount. All in all, not a good purchase. I'm sending it back and buying the limbsaver by Airtech.
customer_reviews.author: kerrylhanley

customer_reviews.title: Works well reducing felt recoil
customer_reviews.text: Buttstock pad was easy to install. I put this on a mosin nagant rifle. Gives my shoulder great comfort while shooting. I will be purchasing more for my other rifles. Oh quality looks and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Old west

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Really helps with recoil. Adds a little length to stock. Patterned my 7 lb shotgun with 3" mags and was not sore the next day. It fits well and does not move much. Wish they would make a camo version. Overall, I highly recommend for recoil reduction.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: my shoulder does not ache any more
customer_reviews.text: my shoulder does not ache any more when shooting skeet. My 12 gauge used to ravish my shoulder with pain. Now I can go to the range, enjoy the day there and come home and not be a hurting unit.
customer_reviews.author: mtmotorguy

customer_reviews.title: Works well and increases comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to shoot twice as long with no pain. Just remember this adds some length to the stock so you may want to remove any spacers or thicker recoil pads to keep the original stock length. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ryniec

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for a high-volume dove hunt in Argentina. 20 gauge shotgun. Very effective at reducing the recoil. Shot 3,000 rounds in 4 days and shoulder never hurt at all. The stretchy lining that holds it on gun tore in 2 spots on one of them on the first day. Otherwise a FANTASTIC product for its intended purpose. Works so well I requested a new one as opposed to refund. The second one I bought for a 74 year old friend had no issue on same hunt and he shot over 4000 rounds with it. He also was very impressed with the comfort it provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of recoil pad seems good. The gel feels like it will definitely absorb ...
customer_reviews.text: received the recoil eraser and plan on using it on several different rifles. most likely my 7mm rem mag but have not installed yet. Quality of recoil pad seems good. The gel feels like it will definitely absorb a lot of recoil and am looking forward to trying it soon. If it fits, I plan on purchasing more but cannot remember what the sizes were.
customer_reviews.author: g d y

customer_reviews.title: Recoil Tamed
customer_reviews.text: The Recoil Eraser did its job, namely, it took out a lot of the recoil from some of the larger caliber rifles. As far as doing what I needed it to do, I have to give it 5 stars. The only thing that I didn't like was that it slid around on the stock under heavy recoil. I attributed that to the calibers used more than a defective design. Overall, it's a good, reliable way to enjoy heavier calibers without beating yourself up in the process. I bought several more, it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!  What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, well packaged. It was a tight fit going on the stock of the Marlin 336W 30-30, but it needed to be. Looks good on the rifle. Big improvement in uncomfortable recoil. Wish I had bought it sooner. Nice product and people.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Sr.

customer_reviews.title: EASY INSTALLATION AND FEELS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Hey this thing installs very easily and was at a good price. I would recommend this product and Seller. Product arrived in NEW CONDITION and was just as advertised! Good smooth Transaction!
customer_reviews.author: MKWood

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great and doesn’t come off once you put it on. It noticeably took down recoil. I put 30 rounds through my .308 and never got sore, so I got one for my girlfriend who’s new to shooting and she refuses to shoot her 20 gauge without it.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Ripped immediately on magpul acs-l
customer_reviews.text: It might be good for some stocks but it isn't good for the magpul acs-l. Ripped as soon as I tried to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: robin barrett

customer_reviews.title: Protection for you and your stock.
customer_reviews.text: Have not shot with it yet, but in comparing it to my previous rubber recoil pad, I like the fit - very snug. It took a little effort to get it over both edges of the butt stock but achieved good fit. It is very well made and the materials used on the Recoil Eraser seem to be easier on the finish of the wood stock than my rubber one was and the gel provides a proven cushion for my shoulder. I will update the review after I go to the range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also a good protector to the brass when setting the Henry down ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits a Henry Big Boy 44 magnum. Keeps the butt from slipping on my shoulder when aiming at my targets.Also a good protector to the brass when setting the Henry down on its butt.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a 80's Mossberg Model 500 With a skinny and narrow shoulder stock. I was worried it wouldn't fit because it seemed to be made for a more "standard" shotgun stock. It fits great; really stretchy but still a tight fit. Probably harder to get on a more standard stock, but it's not going anywhere! The extra padding is just what I needed for the 12 gauge. I'll probably buy more for my other long guns.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Mathy

customer_reviews.title: Nope nope nope
customer_reviews.text: Take the recoil the thing makes the gun slide weird on your shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Dwight price

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit love the extra padding
customer_reviews.text: It has a good tight fit won't just slide off ,the gel pad adds a nice cushion for my shoulder and gives me that extra pull length
customer_reviews.author: Roger Alwine

customer_reviews.title: Fits and does reduce recoil
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to get it over my stock at first but after stretching it out for a bit it slipped right on. The rifle (just under 30 caliber ) I put it on and saw a noticeable reduction of recoil. Personally, when I shot 20 rounds my shoulder was getting sore, yet when the recoil pad was attached after shooting 30 round I had zero soreness. I recommend it, especially if you have it'll to place in-between your shoulder and the butt of the gun.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ryan long

customer_reviews.title: Soft affordable works
customer_reviews.text: Made me able to fire full load 12g .000 buck and slugs thru my KSG...without it being so Painful I had to stop and had a purple and yellow shoulder n chest after Slips right oneven on my bull pup It’s def comfy It also tire a bit when putting it on DONT put it on a brace as now u modified it and it fine if caught
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertized. Comfortable, durable, and really cuts my felt recoil using 30-06 normal loads. Can’t do much about mussle rise, but certainly makes it easy on the shoulder. Bought one for my 12gauge too and it really is fun to shoot now.
customer_reviews.author: G Miles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked using this it helped protect her during shooting sports
customer_reviews.author: julie hunter

customer_reviews.title: A $100 dollar challenge after 100 slug shots in a row on video
customer_reviews.text: Great padding, universal fit, helps dispurse energy that you have to make sure it's a 12g bullet. If you don't notice ease of and better grouping after 100 rounds I will buy any shotgun pad you want for your gun. The only stipulations is you have to film all shots and show your shoulder right after immediately after shoot. Aaron aka the bear.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hattier

customer_reviews.title: It helps some, doesn't fit great
customer_reviews.text: The Recoil Pad shipped out and arrived on time. Real thin material. Not sure how long it will last. Easy to stretch out over stock. It's a little smaller than the but and it doesn't look that great. Helps some but not as much as I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time and in good shape. I use it on my tike t3 ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and in good shape. I use it on my tike t3 270 short mag. It took the sting out of the recoil. Sighting in the gun is good now, not painful!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Paasch

customer_reviews.title: Great pad and great recoil reduction!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a 12ga semi auto. I used it last year for Turkey season. It extended my range time and enjoyment. Killed a turkey hardly noticed the kick!!
customer_reviews.author: Zach T

customer_reviews.title: What a difference
customer_reviews.text: Night and a day difference with the recoil pad. I bought a cheap 12 gauge shotgun years ago. This particular shot gun recoil was a lot worst then my other nicer, expensive shotgun. So I try this recoil pad and what a difference. There is still a recoil but nothing compare to what it was before
customer_reviews.author: hugo hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Small business great product.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good helps to reduce recoil. This was a huge help to me with recoil “Bite”. Will probably order another one. Update, I have bought a second one for me Smith and Wesson 500 smith and Wesson Magnum.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Parks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit anything
customer_reviews.text: Not entirely sure what this is meant to fit. Tried it on three of my hunting arms (Marlin 30-30, Mossberg 12ga, Ruger 30-06) and it did not fit ANY of them. Either the wrong shape or the elastic portion that is meant to hold it on was too long on top or on bottom. Would maybe help the seller to list what exactly this is meant for?
customer_reviews.author: RSR

customer_reviews.title: The Pad That Really Work..
customer_reviews.text: Took the family out for an all day BBQ / Skeet day. Not a whimper from any of the shooters at the end of day. Thanks TinyPrice for getting this recoil pad to me on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sinbad

customer_reviews.title: It worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I used it on my 12 gauge shotgun for clay shooting. I shot 100 shells at the tournament. I wouldn’t have made it without this. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: No sizing on face page, so took a chance. It is made of good quality and seems to be able to do the job it was designed for. It did NOT fit my Henry H014S-308, Henry H009 30-30, Husan AKA1919 Match 12Guage. It was too small.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Gel Pad
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect,no more slam on my arm when the rifle fires.This pad reduces the kick quite abit and alot more enjoyable to shoot this rifle.I would order from this company again and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: It fits my Kel-tec KSG. I had to reverse ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Kel-tec KSG. I had to reverse it and roll it on. Since it is so snug I don't have to worry about constantly readjusting
customer_reviews.author: Tejirof

customer_reviews.title: Greatly reduces recoil of the weapon.
customer_reviews.text: Practically eliminates the recoil of my Remington 1100 Auto 12 gauge shotgun. Doesn't affect my positioning of the gun or my aim. Wish it did, I still suck at shooting skeet. But my shoulder doesn't hurt. :)
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: Painful Recoil Eliminated
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my CZ Scorpion carbine 9 mm. Took painful recoil and eliminated it completely! May not be as good for a real rifle round, but for me, this pad is fantastic.You'll have to try it and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Nyteman

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product nice thick gel cushion nice sturdy materiel. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

product_meta.title: TinyPrice Slip On Recoil Pad, Gel Filled, Black
product_meta.description: The Recoil Pad Gel Filled Recoil Pad is an innovative solution to recoil energy absorption. The pad easily fits over the stock of a long rifle or shotgun without any tools or modifications to the weapon. The pads is has a thin Lycra covered neoprene cuff that stretches over the stock of the gun and does not inhibit the shouldering of the weapon. The butt end of the pad is made from a material with a high surface tension material so that the gun will not move on the shoulder when it is fired. A visco-elastic gel polymer filling absorbs shock to keep you shooting all day.
feature_bullets: Gel filled material Reduces Felt Recoil Up To 70% for more shooting with less soreness
One size fits most makes and models. Fits Rifles and Shotguns
Slip On, Easy Installation. Won't damage your gun
Uses Latest High Tech Gel pads. Thick Gel pad stops the shock
can be easily moved from gun to gun without any tools or modifications to the gun
